statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 500;
SELECT amount, transaction_date, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, sum(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_id = 10
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT bill_id, bill_date, total_amount FROM BillingInformation WHERE payment_status = 'PAID'
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM Transactions WHERE customer_id = 200 AND amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5
SELECT T.*, B.total_amount, B.payment_status FROM Transactions T JOIN BillingInformation B ON T.customer_id = B.customer_id
SELECT * FROM transaction_records;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT billing_id, billing_date, billing_amount FROM billing_information ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM telecom_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_records GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT billing_date, billing_amount FROM billing_information WHERE customer_id = 54321 AND billing_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY billing_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT T.transaction_id, T.transaction_date, B.billing_date, B.billing_amount FROM transaction_records T JOIN billing_information B ON T.customer_id = B.customer_id WHERE B.billing_amount < T.amount ORDER BY T.transaction_date ASC, B.billing_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT R.regulation_name, R.description, T.transaction_date FROM telecom_regulations R LEFT JOIN transaction_records T ON R.regulation_id = T.customer_id WHERE T.amount IS NULL ORDER BY R.regulation_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE last_name = 'Smith'
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT billing_address, payment_method, bill_amount FROM billing_info ORDER BY billing_id ASC
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM telecom_regulations
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT billing_id, billing_address, bill_amount FROM billing_info WHERE bill_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY billing_id ASC
SELECT user_id, address FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name FROM telecom_regulations
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT plan_name, monthly_cost FROM billing_plans WHERE monthly_cost < 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id, amount FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT plan_name, monthly_cost FROM billing_plans WHERE monthly_cost < 50
